TopicTitle: How to get Sketchfab to display materials like Unity does?

Articles.Content:
Have a look at the Sketchfab model here, and at the Unity screenshot below it. The specular map in particular looks a lot worse in the Sketchfab model. I've tried to play with the model settings in Sketchfab.

Any ideas?
